channel.title: git on Canyi Chen
channel.description: Recent content in git on Canyi Chen

item.title: Git basics
item.description: A great and easy understanding introduction to git. Here are just my notes. force pushing git push -u origin master -f Create new branch git checkout -b src switch branch git checkout src Branch src has already existed. show all branches git branch show commitment history git log git log --graph Display with less Roll back # roll back one step git reset --hard HEAD~1 git add .
